channel.title: Project World Of Warcraft
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Please reply to this and tell me what you think of this please![/size]
Ok so a few days ago i was playing WoW and i thught of a idea. "What if i took Alliance and Horde (WoW factions) and added somthing similar to a rsps. So now I am trying to edit a private server to make it a bit more like WoW. Heres my ideas.
-At spawn theres 3 portals red team,blue team and then green protal which puts you on team that needs you most.
-Instead of making all new train areas and stuff for each faction (as I don't want to have to re-upload client because i got dial up and it takes forever) im making 4 areas that you can only attack people on the other faction. at every spot theres a control point. IF you capture it your team can tele there if not they have to tele out side of it (the attacking position) Those 4 areas are:
-Advanced shop area:Has better items then basic shops making it a key objective [b]COMPLETED[/b]
-Skills Area:Allows players to make advanced items if they can't capture the advanced shops. [b]COMPLETED[/b]
-Red Base Camp: A spawn outside reds base that if captured by blue could make them have no were to go.(If this happens and a staff is on he can type a command sending all players back to there base.
-Blue Base Camp: A spawn outside Blues base that if captured by red could make them have no were to go.(If this happens and a staff is on he can type a command sending all players back to there base.
Also when you make a account you get to choose a class which lets you have a special ability.(all special abilitys last for 25 seconds)
-Warrior-Rage-Boosts special attacks strengh by 10%
-Rouge-Invisiblity-Lets you go invisible.
-Hunter-Marksman-Increased bow damage.
-Palidan-Holy Light-gives you 50 hp.
-Priest-Pray-Gives you 50 prayer points
I will give detail on how this project is going as i code it.
Note: I think this is in the right section since it is server development but if it isnt please move it. Thanks
~Updates~ Both shop areas have been completed but not as planned since a ran into a problem making a npc make all players on one team being able to tele to one spot an the other team not being able to. Instead both sides are but on oppisite sides and the objectives in the middle.

item.title: Project World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @ktm ktm
item.description:
@ktm wrote:

Forget what everyone says,I’ve played Runescape for 3 years and WoW for a while,level 75…this is a GREAT idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Project World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:9, topic:334058”][quote author=`Lewk_ link=topic=430449.msg3161378#msg3161378 date=1269570276]
so retarded and unoriginal.
[/quote]

I second this, WOW bites…

Most people are just starting over, many private server owners are getting mad at the “new” servers. Many of which most of us left runescape because updates and the graphics, some make 500+ but still

RSPS’S are turning into something I feared would never happen. Most servers are now switching to high-detail textures, and adding D claws and custom items meant for 1 hit kills.

Enough is enough, I know people want to make a server of what they want to, but to be honest. Do you think people want to play a RSPS that like WOW? Can’t they just play a WOWPS?

Think of it…[/quote]
Yes you have a point why would people play a rsps if they like wow but your also frogeting about the people who like both. Im sure some people who like both would like to see a mix between both games.[quote=“Kihomura, post:7, topic:334058”]the name of the server will be something on one of these two pages.

WoWWiki

World of Warcraft terminology/A-M

Most of this page is redundant to the Game terms category. All terms should be linked to individual articles. Those terms not covered should be separated into separate articles with [[Category:Game terms]] (and [[Category:Acronyms]] as appropriate)...


http://www.wowwiki.com/World_of_Warcraft_Terminology/N-Z[/quote]
Actually a already had my server online before i thought of this project so it won’t be there. I would say the name of it but some one out there will post and complain and say that i advertised so i won’t.

Read full topic

item.title: Project World Of Warcraft
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

`Lewk_:

so retarded and unoriginal.

I second this, WOW bites…

Most people are just starting over, many private server owners are getting mad at the “new” servers. Many of which most of us left runescape because updates and the graphics, some make 500+ but still

RSPS’S are turning into something I feared would never happen. Most servers are now switching to high-detail textures, and adding D claws and custom items meant for 1 hit kills.

Enough is enough, I know people want to make a server of what they want to, but to be honest. Do you think people want to play a RSPS that like WOW? Can’t they just play a WOWPS?

Think of it…

Read full topic

item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

secondly, I thought of this idea ages ago, and it’s a waste of time; Check my development topic if you want.[/quote] Thanks for the advice but i wana try to do this just to see if players like it. If they don’t like it then i won’t finish it.
